item.title: How to check supported protocols and ciphers on HTTPS
item.description: In case you need to check which protocols and ciphers are supported on a HTTPS endpoint you can use nmap for that. Just use the following command, replacing loop0.sh for the desired domain. nmap --script ssl-enum-ciphers -p 443 loop0.sh
